item.title: AT&T acquires T-Mobile
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

[quote=“zachera, post:6, topic:387482”][quote author=yakman link=topic=483282.msg3540145#msg3540145 date=1300813586]
Monopoly / Oligarchy / Plutocracy. Be afraid.
[/quote]AT&T will need it to go against Verizon’s recent iPhone addition.[/quote]

In proper countries government steps in to ensure healthy amounts of competition.
However plutocrats won’t like this because it ruins their monopoly, they stop governments doing it with the help of useful idiots like Frell.

item.title: AT&T acquires T-Mobile
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Hmm, will this deal even be allowed to go through? It gives AT&T a total, complete monopoly on the GSM cell phone network in the USA. The only national competitors are now Verizon and Sprint (both CDMA). Very interesting though, and no wonder, since all the recent TMobile ads have been flaunting it’s new ‘4G’ against AT&T’s notorious slow speeds.

Read full topic
